document_data.name: Tabitha
document_data.mainbody: '''Tabitha''' was a [[paladin]] who had sworn to protect the [[Temple of Lathander (Myth Drannor)|Temple of Lathander]] in [[Myth Drannor]] in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}.
document_data.Description: The paladin had scarlet hair, and teal eyes. She wore a ''[[plate mail]] +2'', a ''[[ring of feather falling]]'', and a ''[[holy symbol]]''. Tabitha carried a ''[[long sword]] +2''.
document_data.History: Tabitha lived in the Temple of Lathander inside Myth Drannor. When the [[Dark God]]'s [[evil]] overran the place, she stood her ground and was barely able to drive back the [[shade]]s, while sustaining nasty injuries in the process. She was disgusted by the amount desecration and defilement that had taken place in the temple.
